oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MOSSBAUER STUDY OF 3D-ION-SUBSTITUTED YBA2(CU, FE, M)3O7-DELTA - M = V, MN
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHRINGI, SN
VADNERE, RV
PRAKASH, OM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: fe-57 mossbauer
yba2cu3o7 substituted
manganese
vanadium
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fe-57 Mossbauer investigations at 300 K have been carried out on V, Mn substituted YBa2Cu3O7-delta system. Preliminary studies show that for small concentration of V (4%), Fe occupies preferentially the Cu(1) site whereas for the same concentration of Mn, Fe prefers the Cu(2) site. It is suggested that for low concentrations V has a preference for Cu(2) site whereas Mn prefers Cu(1) site in the 1-2-3 lattice.
